Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. It's a unique opportunity to experience something truly special. I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $100. This investment will not only provide you with immediate benefits but also long-term value. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
